name: cats and my kids free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:
In this game butterflies carrying targets. Your child must shoot the targets to release the butterflies and help them fly. Top marks is necessary to go to the next level. When a level is successful a cat picture becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
In this game, your child will be keen to show and also skilful. Targets appear and you must hit them throwing a dart. Be careful not to use all your darts. To win the level your child should exceed the score to beat. When a level is successful a cat picture becomes available in the image gallery.

Features:
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of cats.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 pictures of cats to release.

the following languages ​​are available:

Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
